alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 18 at 8:03AM EST until February 18 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, sleet accumulations of around one half to one inch and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch expected. The higher snow totals will be north of Caribou to Van Buren. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northeast Aroostook, Northern Somerset and Northern Piscataquis Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EST Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on very slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause localized hazardous travel. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Power outages are possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel extremely dangerous. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset
